author: Megan Peters
title: Legends Of Tomorrow Season 2, Episode 10: The Legion Of Doom Sneak Peek

organizations.name: legion of doom sneak peek megan peters start photo gal

text:
Legends Of Tomorrow Season 2, Episode 10: The Legion Of Doom Sneak Peek Megan Peters Start Photo Gallery Back to Article Image of 
It looks like the guys over on DC’s Legends Of Tomorrow are in some hot water. Well, one of them seems to be. Tonight, the hit CW drama returned with some stylistic Star Wars flair, and the show promises to bring fans a thrilling adventure featuring some rather nasty villains. UP NEXT: Legends of Tomorrow: Raiders of the Lost Art Recap With Spoilers 
Next week, the Legion of Doom will be making an unwelcome appearance to the show. Folks like Malcolm Merlyn and Damien Darhk will appear on the show as they mess with the Legends and rough up Rip Hunter. Poor guy. 
It’s just like the teaser says. The heroes are doomed if they do and doomed if they don’t. 
You can read up on the synopsis for “The Legion Of Doom” below: 
“The Legends are determined to find and rescue Rip (Arthur Darvill), but first must focus on locating the Spear of Destiny. Stein (Victor Garber) thinks he has the perfect person to help but knows involving her will be risky. Meanwhile, Malcom Merlyn (guest star John Barrowman) and Damien Darhk (guest star Neal McDonough) realize that Thawne (guest star Matt Letscher) is pitting them against each other.” 
Caity Lotz, Brandon Routh, Dominic Purcell, Nick Zano, Franz Drameh and Maisie Richardson-Sellers also star. 
Eric Laneuville directed the episode written by Phil Klemmer & Marc Guggenheim.
